HEADER.NAME: Wesley van der Kop
HEADER.LABEL: Hello, my name is
HEADER.DESCRIPTION: I'm an enthusiastic DevOps engineer, currently I'm making beautiful products at Essent. You can find my what I'm up to at LinkedIn or if you're interested in more of my work get in contact with me.

ABOUT.TITLE: Developing while
ABOUT.LABEL: About me
ABOUT.INFO--FIRST: I enjoy what I do and you can often find me late searching for new things and challenges. When I'm not sitting in front of my laptop, then I'd like to work out like fitness or other activities, or do other fun activities with my friends.
ABOUT.INFO--SECOND: I currently work at Essent as a DevOps engineer. Because of my interest in trying new things, I also had my own business Digital Stamp for a time. If you are interested in what I'm doing, you can also view LinkedIn or go to Github or Dribbble. You can also always ask questions via mail@wesleyvanderkop.nl.
ABOUT.INFO--THIRD: It's my dream to be able to travel far and see more of the world and to be able to do my work in other places in the world. I'm always open to new challenges and I'm always open to a chat when it comes to topics that are intriguing.

SKILL_SET.TITLE: Front-end Development & Design
SKILL_SET.LABEL: My skillset
SKILL_SET.INFO--FIRST: I'm specialize in building web applications, creating SaaS & on-prem products, working in teams with scrum and SAFe agile methods and designing digital products. I love creating new digital products.
SKILL_SET.INFO--SECOND: But what kind of skills? Of course the general knowledge with html and css (scss), javascript and various frameworks / libraries where my specialty lies in Angular. Knowledge of the back-end is of course also there, but my specialty lies in the front-end, but I am always open to something new. Making connections to the back-end via APIs is also part of the job! When it comes to designing, my skills are with the tools Sketch, Photoshop and Illustrator.
SKILL_SET.INFO--THIRD: During my work at Essent, Everbridge, Respond & MediaMonks I learned a lot about working in different teams and also managing them. I also always like to hear how customers work with their products and see if there are any problems with them so that they can be solved immediately.

WORK.TITLE: Work
WORK.GO_TO_WORK_SITE: Go to the website of {{ job }}

CONTACT.TITLE: Let's get in contact!
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: If you'd like to talk about the future, just drop me a message at mail@wesleyvanderkop.nl. I'm always up for a new challenge.
